body: So.. this is the good end? The wife wont come back again to the douche? They live happily ever after?

Yeah plus theres literally the other option that almost no ntr characters consider... if shes been trained to be a slut then you can just take her and train her back into being your slut, literally not that hard, its just a matter of psychological conditioning plus neurochemistry. Plus the antagonist has already stepped way outside of the safety of the law (rape, etc) so to eliminate further competition you can just kill the antagonist or make him a eunuch or whatever you want. I always appreciate an MC that realises those things and acts on them; unfortunately this isn't one of them, at least they have a semi happy ending though.

Omoshiroi! To be totally honest, the pain isn't that strong because kyoden-sensei stretched the story out for 540 pages, but its still in there. First I thought I'll get bored of it, thinking a 500 page ntr ain't worth it, but the fucking art style is so hot I couldn't take my eyes of the screen. The scenes itself might be redundant and the sex overweighs the plot by a huge margin, which is normal for ntr mangas spanning 20+ chapters. Overall rating for me is 8/10. Would prolly not read again it's too time consuming.

I'll always praise the artwork and as you desensitize yourself over the years, You kinda look for storylines and fantasies to satisfy your kink...That being said, the ending of this really makes you want to nuke the planet, NTR usually has laughably unrealistic characters and plots so I don't feel like trash, it's all just fiction but man I really questioned life after this.
